name: CodePile
author: Ryan Rhode

sections.description:
Modular

With an assortment of simple and useful features that can be enabled as you like.

Convenient

Configure your site how you want it without having to install or code plugins for every little thing.

Easy and Efficient

Each feature is easy to use and only loaded on the pages where you want it to be thereby retaining efficiency.

Always Growing

An ever expanding selection of functionality to help you make your website work how you want.

Feel free to request a new feature!

Features

  • Admin bar removal
  • Adjust memory limit
  • Coming soon page
  • Comments on custom post types
  • Edit comment forms
  • Date Shortcodes
    • Current Date
    • Current Year
    • Future or Past Date
  • Icons
    • FontAwesome
    • Fork Awesome
    • Friconix
  • jQuery UI Themes

Premium Features

A premium version of CodePile is coming soon!

For more features order the premium version on codepile.ca

There is always more coming!

Support

  • Free support direct from the developer
  • Updates & fixes
  • Full documentation
  • New features added regularly
sections.installation:
From your WP admin dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for CodePile
  3. Click Install and then click Activate

Download from wordpress.org

  1. Download the zip file from wordpress.org
  2. Go to your WP admin and go to Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin
  3. Select the file you downloaded and click Install Now
  4. Activate CodePile

After activation

Go to your WP admin to CodePile > Features and enable any features you want. Each feature you enable will add a new menu item under the CodePile menu with more options.
